entry.title: One step back, Two steps forward
entry.summary:
Author: Wildcatamber420

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,330Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Marinette’s life is getting too unbalanced. Tikki is very worried for her chosen’s mental health and wants to do something. But universe itself is also trying to balance her life both outside and inside the mask. So here it was, someone literally brought the balance to her chaotic life and forced the unwanted out. It started with one actual friend with abilities and it ended with a support system she would never forget.
